thread.title: Four MLS players in Ghana squad for Canada friendly
thread.title_full: Four MLS players in Ghana squad for Canada friendly

title: Four MLS players in Ghana squad for Canada friendly
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 00:10 CET Four MLS players in Ghana squad for Canada friendly 
Ghana's 18-man squad to face Canada on Tuesday in an international friendly includes MLS quartet Harrison Afful, Kwadwo Poku, Lloyd Sam and David Sam. 
Two of the continent Poku and Sam are debutants. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us Love and Forgiveness are the two characters of a man that restore evalasting joy and peace in man. By: samuel_abonyi@yahoo.
